subject: Re: [junit] testing abstract clases
msgSnippet: Hi, You can test the child(i.e class implementing the abstarct class).By the way you can get the parent covered.Dont think of writing a test class for abstract
messageBody:
Hi,

You can test the child(i.e class implementing the abstarct class).By the way you can get the parent covered.Dont think of writing a test class for abstract class.


Thx.


with luv,
your near and dear,

SK.Karthik
